column4: When I mount a smb share using cifs, symlinks on the remote share are treated as absolute on my system. For example if I navigate to //host/share/mnt (which on the remote system is a symlink to /mnt) directs my system to it's local /mnt. How can I make it work correctly?
iirc there's a server-side switch to change that
thanks - without knowing whether or not its a client or server issue, it's tough to know where to start :)
can't find it offhand, so I might be wrong
